Description: Description. A ladies /girls solid silver sterling (925) artisan decorated wrist watch / bracelet, the watch has a high quality Japan quartz movement, with a stainless steel back, the watches frame and band is (925) silver, and stamped 925, the watch / bracelet comes with a safety chain clasp. The battery has not been changed lately, but works perfectly and keeps good timing. The watch/band may need cleaning and polishing. Band is good for a wrist of / up to 16 cm. in diameter ( small size 5 to 6 " ) Unpacked watch weight, 68 grams. All weights and measurements are approximate. Take a good look at the pictures, sold as-is. Please refer to item description/measurements for actual size. Colors may differ slightly with items on pictures, due to lighting conditions, and color settings of different computers. All items sold are used vintage or antique, and are not perfect or new. All items will be shipped registered mail in about 24 hours after payment. Items paid for on Friday or Saturday will be sent on Sunday. Payment: I accept paypal only Handling time: about 1 working day, all items will be sent by registered mail, signed for, insured, with Israel tracking number. Shipping time: about 12 to 23 working days Return Policy: Buyer pays return shipping Dear customer, I hope you like the item, and hope you will buy from me again, if for any reason you don't intend leaving me a positive feedback, contact me, I will resolve any problem. Once a positive feedback is left, I will return the same. Customs fees vat, taxes and country regulations are in customers responsibility Please contact me only at my MESSAGES on eBay (not by email)To measure your wrist for a good bracelet size, you can use a cloth type measuring tape, a piece of string, or a thin strip of paper, and measure slightly above the wrist bone. The bracelet should fit with a snug, and a bit of room. If you like a looser fit, take the next size up.Extra Small ( fits 4 ½ to 5“ wrist)Small ( fits 5 ½ to 6“ wrist)Medium ( fits 6 ½ to 7” wrist) Large ( fits 7 ½ to 8” wrist) Extra large ( fits 8 ½ to 9” wrist) For example, if your wrist measures 7” a medium will fit quite closely, a large will fit loose and dangle.b 3
Title: WOMEN'S SILVER WATCH BRACELET, TURQUOISE STONES, SAFETY CHAIN, WORKING CONDITION
